name: Workspaces to Dock
description:
A Gnome Shell extension that transforms the workspaces of the overview mode into an intellihide dock.  The dock is positioned and sized to maintain tight integration with the Gnome Shell.

The latest release includes support for localization, the ability to detect user themes that support workspace captions, and the option to extend the height of the dock.

Please see the Github homepage for details on installation, settings, known issues, and version features. A backport is also available on Github for Gnome Shell 3.2 users.
